about_the_game:
A set of Sepith ore items used to synthesize quartz.
Sepith can be used in quartz synthesis or to power up slots.
Sepith Lumps can be redeemed for mira.
Earth Sepith x2000
Water Sepith x2000
Fire Sepith x2000
Wind Sepith x2000
Time Sepith x2000
Space Sepith x2000
Mirage Sepith x2000
Sepith Lump x2000

A set of a rare material that can be used to strengthen weapons or trade for quartz or other items.
U-Material x100
U-Material+ x20

A set of monster ingredients essential for cooking.
Beast Flesh x40
High-Grade Beast Flesh x20
Beast Extract x40
High-Grade Beast Extract x20

A set of advanced medicine that will come in handy in a pinch.
Tear All Balm x20
EP Charge IV x20
Celestial Balm EX x20

A 10-pack of a rare recovery item that revives, fully heals, and grants 100 CP.

If used during battle, a Shining Pom will appear. After the battle, your party members' levels will increase by 1.

Block 3 x1
